name: Rescape!
description:
Enjoy playing this prototype of a "Rythm and puzzle" game.
* This game was mainly made for the Genre Mash Jam *, the theme is reusable, Whats reusable? actually the game idea is "Not reusable", because you cant pass trough the same path.

How the game works

There are 2 players, they need to reach the goal to escape. If one falls it turns into a ghost block, and the other player can pass over it. There is also music that indicates your player movement!

There is also cool features like levers, enemies, respawn blocks...

Get to the end to escape!

All the game was made by @ItsAssasin :)

Also this is my first "game" submited to itch.io, i know it has got bugs and its not very confortable, but i had to do it in less than 6 days. I also know the resolution is not the optimal, but is the only thing i can do, the timeline is like 20m away xd.
